name: Sunsilk Detox Conditioner Green Tea & Lemon
description: Does heat, humidity, and pollution leave your hair flat and limp?  Look no further. Presenting New Sunsilk Green Tea and Lemon conditioner, purifies the hair strands while nourishing, leaving hair fresh and bouncy from root to tips – like detoxing your hair! This exclusive conditioning product freshens and smoothens your hair without weighing it down. Fresh and full of life hair, everyday.  *Images for illustration purposes only. Product received may vary.
